title: Understanding Characters and Events in Charlotte's Web
description: In this lesson, students will explore the motivations and feelings of characters in 'Charlotte's Web,' discuss important events and their consequences, and make predictions about the story.

prompts.input: Why do you think Charlotte wants to help Wilbur? Explain your reasoning.
hints: Think about how Charlotte feels about Wilbur as a friend.
Consider what might happen to Wilbur if Charlotte doesn't help.

prompts.input: How do you think Fern feels when she learns that Wilbur is going to be sold? Why do you think she feels that way?
hints: Consider what Fern's relationship with Wilbur is like.
Think about how she might react to losing someone she cares about.

prompts.input: What do you think might happen if Charlotte's plan to save Wilbur doesn't work? How did you come to that conclusion?
hints: Think about the challenges Wilbur faces throughout the story.
Consider what other characters might do if Charlotte's plan fails.

subject: Language Arts
